attributes.action:
2016 Referendum badly flawed
Suspend Brexit.
Hold better Referendum ?!
attributes.additional_details:
Divided Party easy tactical job result not as hoped = FIASCO

Lords Report 2009 Referendums UK:Balanced conclusion,significant drawbacks.Most appropriate on fundamental Constitutional issues. Emphasize good public information if to be deliberative.Concern at effectiveness of information.Commend use of independent body.

Current Parliamentary franchise totally wrong for referendum question as put eg including Irish or Commonwealth citizens while excluding EU citizens in UK or many British in EU.
attributes.background:
Fundamental Constitutional issue:FRANCHISE excluded many UK resident EU/EU resident British,even taxpayer citizens-all also likely much affected
INFORMATION meagre for proper assessment of arguments
REF flawed,whatever result.This is not about legalities but principle relevance and common sense

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand you are concerned about the 2016 referendum, but we're not sure exactly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253636
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235954
